attributes.action: Keep the under 9s sex ed ban
attributes.additional_details: We do not need sex education for children under 9 years of age and I want to prevent the Government from scrapping the current statutory guidelines banning sex education for children under 9 years of age.
attributes.background: Government are set to scrap statutory  guidelines for sex education for children under 9 years of age. This will mean a return to teaching children as young as 4 years old about sex education instead of leaving them to be children.

rejection.details:
There is no statutory ban on sex education for children under 9, and the government is not mandating such education for very young children.
